title: Em Hiểu Rồi (我懂了)
lyrics: Wo zai jin tui de lu kou Wo kan bu jian le tian kong Wo kuai le ma wo ye hao xiang duo yi duo Dao ni de xiong kou Wo de xi bei ni de zi you Jiu xiang cai hong duan zan dou liu Ni kuai le ba, ni zhao dao ni de chu kou Ni zhen de zi you Wo bu ai guo jiu bu dong ji mo Wo bu nan guo lei you zen me hui liu Ai de gou zhong shang de gou tong Zheng ming wo ai guo oh oh Xing fu zou guo cai fu xian gan dong, Xing yun de wo ceng yong ni de wen rou Ni de xiao rong hai you ni wen hou Dou rang wo xin dong oh oh Ni xi huan guo ni chen ni guo ni can ren guo Zhe yi ke wo dou dong ..Wo zhen de zi you
